breeding.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Open-sea fish lay several million eggs each breeding season.
breeding.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the activity of keeping animals or plants in order to produce animals or plants that have particular qualities
breeding.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Benson took great care in selecting breeding stock  (=animals you keep to breed from).
breeding.translation[0].definitions[2].d: the fact of coming from a family of high rank and having polite social behaviour
breeding.translation[0].definitions[2].e: The young lieutenant had an air of wealth and good breeding.
